https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yhXOfnkBxEwaGpddJUfEsbFgyJS.jpg In the middle of the night, Magloire is smoking a cigarette in an abandoned train station when the police shows up for an ID check. He starts running with no luggage, no future until he meets a dying man from whom he inherits a fortune. Magloire is now pursued by a gang. He becomes their hostage, but accomplice too. As he doesn’t anything to lose. Like someone who gets away with everything, someone with no expectations… 9 Fingers
